next.title: Exploiting HTTP Parameter Smuggling in Golang
next.summary: Oxeye’s security research team has found a security vulnerability in Golang-based applications. Under certain conditions, it lets a threat actor bypass validations based on HTTP request parameters due to the use of unsafe URL parsing.
